description_text:
Hello I would like to add the baseplate to my order as a whole package could you please help me in doing so my order is SSN6072 I would like to either cancel and reorder correctly or pay difference instead of having to pay more separately please help

Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: I would just like to cancel my order and reorder a complete different package. Please help. I didn’t realize and don’t not get everything I want
What the bundle with the baseplate and hydraulic
I am willing to purchase upgrade and baseplate separately if it can be included in same shipping
Please help me get the right bundle please. I want to get the silver 3 pedal set with baseplate and hydraulic
I have bought the new bundle and would like to stop/cancel this order asap thank you
Hi Alejandro Martinez,    Okay, we've canceled your order #SSN6072.

thank you very much I have been charged for the product and funds are not in my account when will this reflect?
Sent from my iPhone

>
